name: Opera GX Thin Messenger
description: It's modified userstyle from kharkiv adminko (317041) to delete third column in opera gx messenger widget. Now Messenger are more useful.
css:
@-moz-document domain("messenger.com") {
             [data-pagelet="Stories"]
             ,[role="complementary"]
             ,[data-pagelet="navigation"] > div > [data-visualcompletion="ignore"]
             ,[class="rq0escxv l9j0dhe7 du4w35lb j83agx80 cbu4d94t g5gj957u f4tghd1a ifue306u kuivcneq t63ysoy8"]
             ,[role="banner"]
             ,[role="main"] > div > div > div:not(:last-child)
             ,[role="main"] > div > div > div:nth-child(4) > div > div:nth-child(3)
             ,[role="main"] > div > div > div:nth-child(4) > div > div:nth-child(4)
             {display:none!important;}
}
